meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'fat', meaning having a lot of excess body weight.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was the phattest animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: She was the phattest person in the room, struggling to fit through the door.
meanings.sent3: The phattest cat in the neighborhood tried to squeeze through the tiny cat door.
meanings.sent4: His backpack was so phattest, it looked like he was carrying a small car on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The phattest sumo wrestler in the competition easily pushed his opponents out of the ring.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'fat', meaning having a large amount of something, such as money or possessions.
meanings.sent1: After winning the lottery, she became the phattest millionaire in town.
meanings.sent2: The phattest house on the block had a swimming pool and a tennis court.
meanings.sent3: His phattest wallet burst open from holding too many credit cards.
meanings.sent4: The phattest treasure chest in the pirate's cave was overflowing with gold coins.
meanings.sent5: The phattest bank account in the city belonged to the billionaire entrepreneur.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'fat', meaning very cool or impressive.
meanings.sent1: The phattest skateboard trick of the day amazed everyone at the park.
meanings.sent2: Her phattest dance moves lit up the dance floor at the party.
meanings.sent3: The phattest sunglasses he wore made him look like a movie star.
meanings.sent4: The phattest concert of the year had the crowd cheering non-stop.
meanings.sent5: The phattest car in the showroom turned heads with its sleek design.
